name: Chess Club
description: Sharpen your mind and make new friends! We welcome players of all skill levels, from beginners to seasoned strategists. Join us for weekly meetings, tournaments, and casual games.

name: Music Society
description: Do you love to play, sing, or simply appreciate music? Our society brings together musicians and music lovers from all genres. We organize jam sessions, concerts, and workshops.

name: Campus Plant Enthusiasts
description: For students with a green thumb or anyone curious about the world of plants! We explore botany, gardening, and sustainable living through workshops, plant swaps, and field trips.

name: The University Drama Club
description: Step into the spotlight! Our drama club offers opportunities for acting, directing, scriptwriting, and stage management. Participate in plays, musicals, and improv nights.

name: Architectural Design Club
description: A space for aspiring architects and design enthusiasts to collaborate, share ideas, and explore the principles of architecture through discussions, design challenges, and site visits.
